## `IsIncludingFleschRulerDocGroups`

Returns whether document group labels are drawn next to the syllable ruler on Flesch charts for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
boolean IsIncludingFleschRulerDocGroups()
```

### Return value {-}

Type: `boolean`
:::
